title: Soothing Ginger Tea
preparation: Boil water with ginger, add lemon and honey to taste.
usage: Drink warm to soothe a sore throat.

title: Aloe Vera for Burns
preparation: Apply aloe vera gel to the affected area.
usage: Use for minor burns to soothe and heal the skin.

title: Turmeric Milk
preparation: Warm the milk, mix in turmeric and honey.
usage: Drink before bed for anti-inflammatory benefits.

title: Garlic for Cold
preparation: Chew on a clove of garlic.
usage: Helps to alleviate cold symptoms.

title: Cinnamon Honey Tea
preparation: Steep cinnamon in hot water, add honey to taste.
usage: Drink to soothe a sore throat.

title: Peppermint Tea
preparation: Steep peppermint leaves in hot water.
usage: Drink to relieve digestive discomfort.

title: Chamomile Tea for Relaxation
preparation: Steep chamomile flowers in hot water for 5 minutes.
usage: Drink before bed to improve sleep quality.

title: Honey Lemon Cough Syrup
preparation: Mix honey and lemon juice.
usage: Take a spoonful to relieve cough.

title: Oatmeal Bath for Skin Irritation
preparation: Add colloidal oatmeal to warm bath water.
usage: Soak to soothe irritated skin.

title: Salt Water Gargle
preparation: Dissolve salt in warm water.
usage: Gargle to relieve sore throat and reduce oral bacteria.

title: Apple Cider Vinegar for Digestion
preparation: Mix a tablespoon of apple cider vinegar with water.
usage: Drink to aid digestion.

title: Baking Soda for Heartburn
preparation: Dissolve a teaspoon of baking soda in water.
usage: Drink to neutralize stomach acid.

title: Eucalyptus Steam Inhalation
preparation: Add a few drops of eucalyptus oil to hot water.
usage: Inhale the steam to clear nasal congestion.

title: Banana for Energy Boost
preparation: Eat a ripe banana.
usage: Provides a quick energy boost with natural sugars and fibre.

title: Coconut Oil for Dry Skin
preparation: Apply coconut oil to dry skin areas.
usage: Moisturises and nourishes the skin.

title: Yogurt for Gut Health
preparation: Consume a serving of plain yogurt.
usage: Promotes a healthy digestive tract with probiotics.

title: Ginger for Nausea
preparation: Chew on a small piece of ginger or drink ginger tea.
usage: Helps to alleviate nausea and digestive upset.

title: Tea Tree Oil for Acne
preparation: Dilute tea tree oil with a carrier oil and apply to affected areas.
usage: Natural antimicrobial properties help reduce acne.

title: Cucumber Slices for Puffy Eyes
preparation: Cut cucumber into slices and chill.
usage: Place over eyes to reduce puffiness and refresh tired eyes.

title: Honey for Minor Cuts
preparation: Apply a small amount of honey to minor cuts or grazes.
usage: Natural antibacterial properties aid in healing.

title: Lavender Essential Oil Sleep Aid
preparation: Add a few drops of lavender essential oil to a diffuser before bedtime.
usage: Inhale the aroma to promote relaxation and improve sleep quality.

title: Golden Honey Immunity Booster
preparation: Mix turmeric and a pinch of black pepper into raw honey.
usage: Consume a spoonful daily to boost immunity and fight inflammation.

title: Activated Charcoal for Detox
preparation: Stir activated charcoal powder into water and add a splash of lemon juice.
usage: Drink to absorb toxins and cleanse the digestive system.

title: Rosehip Oil for Skin Regeneration
preparation: Apply rosehip oil directly to the face or affected skin areas.
usage: Use to hydrate skin, reduce scars, and promote regeneration.

title: Matcha Green Tea Energy Shot
preparation: Whisk matcha powder in hot water until frothy and add honey if desired.
usage: Drink in the morning or before exercise for a natural energy boost.

title: Thyme Steam for Respiratory Relief
preparation: Add thyme to boiling water and inhale the steam.
usage: Use to clear respiratory passages and ease breathing.

title: Arnica Salve for Bruises and Swelling
preparation: Infuse arnica flowers in coconut oil, strain, and mix with melted beeswax to form a salve.
usage: Apply to bruises and swollen areas to reduce inflammation and speed healing.

title: Flaxseed Gel for Digestive Health
preparation: Soak flaxseeds in water overnight, strain, and use the gel.
usage: Consume the gel or add to smoothies to improve digestion and bowel movements.

title: Himalayan Salt Sole for Hydration
preparation: Dissolve Himalayan salt in water to create a sole (salt solution).
usage: Drink a teaspoon of the sole mixed in a glass of water each morning on an empty stomach.

title: Mint and Lemon Foot Soak
preparation: Combine mint leaves, lemon slices, and Epsom salt in warm water.
usage: Soak feet to refresh and relieve tired, achy feet.
